title: My entire google account vanished (all devices)
content:
Not sure if anyone can shed some light onto this.
I tried going into youtube, and it was returning "oops something went wrong"
So I tried signing out and back in (on chrome) and it was saying that my gmail address was not recognised. I then couldnt sign in on anything.
I found a link to recover, and I seem to be back on now, but really concerned as to why this would happen.
I obviously didnt delete my account.
I opened an online chat to ask this, but the person on the other end stopped responding, now if I go in again, it says that I have an open case.
I tried the call option, and got an automated call back immediately, but after holding for arounf 6 minutes, the call hung up, so I cant even go down this route now.
Any ideas please, as this really shocked me.
Thanks
